text: Susan Dilys Dougan, OBE ( Ryan, born 3 March 1955 in Colonarie, Saint Vincent), is the Governor-General of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines since 1 August 2019. She is the first female Governor-General of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. == References == Category:1955 births Category:Governors-General of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:Living people
title: Susan Dougan
